title: Honor 0 Rewards?
body:
So a while back, I got really drunk and said some stupid stuff in a game, which resulted in me getting a 14 day ban and honor zero. At the time, I didn't really think much of it, but then I realized that there might be end of season reward restrictions for honor zero players. I looked online, and there is no mention of honor zero having any impact on end of season rewards other than not being able to get the honor 3/4/5 ward skins. Just wanted to clarify and ask: If I end the season at honor zero, would I still get the victorious skin, loading screen border, and icon? Thanks for any help. 

PS: My ban was beginning of August, nowhere near the August 22 cutoff for account restrictions.

replies.body: Doesn't seem like being Honor Rank 0 disqualifies you from anything except the Honor Ward Skin. You should be just fine as long as you don't get another 14-day ban, or end the season with a chat restriction.
